artist: Artist: Taguchi Beisaku; Publisher: Mizuno Asajirō
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: vertical ōban triptych; triptych forming a single image; blustery, snowy landscape scene; figure on horseback, wearing snow gear in center; standing figure in right image; house in top left image, slightly obscured by wind and snow
inscription: on left sheet, on back, in LLC, in pencil: RD0206129 DHI
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Picture of Our Officer Single-Handedly Scouting Out Enemy Territory Braving the Heavy Snow
